sentences: Tema andis aktsepti lepingule kohe pärast seda, kui nägi tingimusi.
Aktsept ei saa kehtida ilma allkirjata.
context: The word 'lepingu' is part of the term 'aktsepti lepingu' which refers to an acceptance agreement - a legal document where someone agrees to take on financial or other obligations (such as paying bills, redeeming a bill, fulfilling contract terms). It's related to the concept of 'aktsept' (acceptance) in commercial law. The word appears to be in the genitive case, indicating possession or relationship to the acceptance agreement.
